April 25, 2025 - Kerry was founded in 1972 in Listowel, County Kerry as a private company (North Kerry Milk Products) with three shareholders – state-owned Dairy Disposal Company (42.5%), a federation of eight small farmer co-operatives in Kerry (42.5%) and Erie Casein Company Inc.
Kerry Dairy Ireland consists of the company's dairy consumer products brands and its dairy ingredients business.
